TopicTitle: Where is the input setting for focus active vessel in map view.

Articles.Content:
I want to focus the active vessel in map view (I guess the wiki calls it: Reset focus in orbital map). I know the button for this is supposed to be the ` button but this one is not working, though, I am on linux, so it might be different. Either way, I remember rebinding the key for it to something that is easyer to remember and worked on an older install, so I am assuming there is a setting to do that. But I can't find this under the "input" settings, I kinda expected it to be under "vessel", and I checked like, every other input settings menu but I can't find it.

So.. where is the option? does it have a different name? Is it there but did I just mis it?
I guess I was just blind, I reset settings (which I don't think should have mattered), I managed to find it under game > camera > camera reset.

There's a difference between ' (apostrophe) and ` (backtick), the key you want is ' (apostrophe). On my keyboard that's two along from L and also has @ on it, but other layouts might have ' and " together instead; while ` is in the top left corner with some other weird symbols that nobody will ever use in normal typing (what is ¬ supposed to be, besides the nose on a smiley? :¬D )

The settings screen does show an apostrophe, with the default settings for an English-language keyboard, but that is a lie.

The default key to reset the focus in map mode, is actually ` back quote at the upper left of the keyboard.
